name: UNOS Development
overview:
Unos Development Ltd (UDL) is a subsidiary company of FSBM Holdings Bhd. UDL develops and offers a wide range of solutions that meet the diverse communications requirements of global users today. These solutions, which consist of voice, data and applications, are being developed and commissioned across fixed-mobile networks to enable global users to communicate, interact and connect seamlessly through one distinct point of convergence namely: UNOS PRO

UNOS is a Midlet (software for mobile phones). UNOS empowers the mobile phone users with easy-to-use telecommunications and Private Branch eXchange (PBX) functionalities at low cost, while also incorporating powerful messaging functions that will equip businesses with an alternative means to reach out to customers through the various UNOS applications.

UNOS was designed to support the Fixed-Mobile Convergence. It is also service provider and mobile infrastructure neutral, i.e. it can operate on any network in any country and services can be initiated via any IP medium. To date, UNOS has established its business presence in many parts of Asia. The company is also fast expanding its operations internationally
